summary: NBIC drew upon multiple sources of information to study ports of entry at higher risk for travelers exposed to emerging pandemic viruses. emerging infectious diseases may disseminate internationally to the DHS workforce and/or domestic U.S. population. emerging infectious diseases may disseminate internationally to the DHS workforce. quency of flights and number of passengers averaged over a two week period for a given date. NBIC analysts reviewed flight data to identify airports with the highest passenger travel on direct-flights from areas of disease emergence.
